sourceMeaningMnemonic: There's <radical>rice</radical> spread out all over the <radical>ground</radical>. This will cause the Predator to <kanji>come</kanji> because he loves kome (rice). Then once he's gone, the <kanji>next</kanji> Predator will come to eat.
meaningInfo: Also imagine everyone else coming to the rice next. When rice spills, people come from all around to line up and grab a handful of it to take home. Who's next? Come forward!
readingMnemonic: When they come, though, everyone is disappointed. It turns out it's <reading>rye</reading> (<ja>らい</ja>) grains, and rye grains taste terrible. Yuck.
readingInfo: If you love rye grains, on the other hand, imagine everyone being really happy that they came to get the rice. They're so lucky it's rye!
